On Windows Vista, when I try to use ActiveWriter with the NHQG integration ('Use NHQG' option), I get an error related to the Vista security:
Error 1 Running transformation: System.ComponentModel.Win32Exception: Access is denied at System.Diagnostics.Process.StartWithCreateProcess(ProcessStartInfo startInfo) at System.Diagnostics.Process.Start() at Altinoren.ActiveWriter.CodeGeneration.CodeGenerationHelper.UseNHQG(Assembly assembly) at Altinoren.ActiveWriter.CodeGeneration.CodeGenerationHelper.Generate() at Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating89A8FA2BDC63CCA622EC52570EC62D60.GeneratedTextTransformation.TransformText() in c:\Dev\Ausy\Sandbox\Jodalia\Jodalia.Model\Model.actiw:line 32 C:\Dev\Ausy\Sandbox\Jodalia\Jodalia.Model\Model.actiw 1 1
Update : Ooooopss, actually, I had set the NHQG executable path with an incorrect value ... doesn't have anything to do with Vista & security. Maybe the value of this property should be checked and an better message should be thrown?
